translation.value: Valued at [%cash#1-roundsmall-short][COMMENT: FR 10661; player overview; string diaplyed a player's estimated monetary value]

Anchor Defender
Does his defending close to goal, specialising in last ditch blocks and clearances.

Spreader Defender
The cultured modern defender, comfortable with the ball at his feet and adept at making progressive passes.

Aggressor Defender
Doesn't shy away from getting involved, excelling at winning back possession in the air and on the ground.

Progressor Full Back
Active at both ends of the pitch, making a high number of progressive passes and winning the ball back regularly.

Overlapper Full Back
An engine on the flanks, who regularly looks to sprint forward and send in crosses.

Water Carrier Midfielder
The unsung hero who keeps things ticking over, superb at winning possession and playing it safe.

Quarterback Midfielder
The heartbeat in build-up play, regularly involved in possession and excels at progressing the ball and making key passes.

Box Crasher Midfielder
A midfielder in name only; outstanding at getting into the area and forcing shooting opportunities.

Wide Threat Forward
Stretches the back line and gets into the penalty area; an absolute menace when running with the ball.

Maestro Forward
A free spirit who will drop deep or wide into pockets of space and is a master at creating opportunities for others.

Target Striker
An absolute bully who acts as the fulcrum in the attacking phase; dominant in the air.

Fox In The Box Striker
Elusive and clinical, a volume scorer who outperforms expectations.
Playing Style[COMMENT - release comment screen - topic]
These are the default ranges. If you have changed the boundaries in the xml files, this key will not be accurate.
